items.title: Amazon’s Best Books of 2025
items.description: Amazon editors name the best books of the year, Sabrina Carpenter signs on to star in an Alice in Wonderland adaptation, and more.

items.title: Book Riot’s Deals of the Day for November 12, 2025
items.description: A teen who vanishes from summer camp, a Native rom-com, a book named to several "best of 2025" lists, and more of today's great book deals.

items.title: New YA Book Releases for November 12, 2025
items.description: The roommate from Literal Hell, all's fair in love and gaming, and more of today's new YA book releases in hardcover and in paperback.

items.title: Lists on Lists of the Best Nonfiction Books of the Year
items.description: Barnes & Noble, Publishers Weekly, and the Southern Independent Booksellers Alliance announce their favorite nonfiction books of the year.

items.title: Best of 2025 Mystery Lists Have Begun
items.description: A cute Agatha Christie adaptation, a One Battle After Another chat, a new streamer to now, and more.
